Comment 11: 
Cool! Makes me feel better.

Yeah, the documentation for V8 sucks. I think it just doesn't like other threads
accessing it other than the one that first initialized it. When I do "v8::Locker lock"
it fixes the problem. The Isolate calls also fix it as well. I think I'll be able to
achieve what I want with a combination of the two. Just wish there were more code
samples :-\...
